Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute near 47th Street/Princeton
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses rrtd EB via 47th, Princeton, 51st, Wentworth & 47th; WB via 47th, LaSalle, 43rd, Wentworth & 47th, due to police activity near 47th St/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near 47th Street/Princeton.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, Princeton, 51st, Wentworth, then resume their normal route on 47th.
  • Westbound buses will operate via 47th, LaSalle, 43rd, Wentworth, then resume their normal route on 7th.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporary rerouted via 47th, LaSalle, 43rd, Wentworth then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 47th Street/Princeton.
